roleset.name: assent to
roleset.note: APPROVE-V NOTES: Based on big corpus. Member of Vncls marvel-31.3-6, allow-64, judgement-33. (from approve.01-v)
APPROVAL-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry approve.01 and OntoNotes grouping approval-n sense 1; maps to VN classes allow-64, judgement-33, marvel-31.3-6. Framed by Claire. (from approval.01-n)

example.name: NP approval
example.text: Shareholders approved Pacific First Financial's acquisition by Royal Trustco Ltd of Toronto for $27 a share, or $212 million.
example.arg: Pacific First Financial's acquisition by Royal Trustco Ltd of Toronto for $27 a share, or $212 million.

example.name: PP approval
example.text: 50% of voters approve of the President's job performance.

example.name: attribute with as
example.text: On Friday, the Merc's board announced that it had approved Sabine Pipe Line Co.'s Henry Hub in Erath, La., as the delivery sit for its long-awaited natural gas futures contract.
example.arg: Sabine Pipe Line Co.'s Henry Hub in Erath, La.,
the delivery sit for its long-awaited natural gas futures contract

example.name: attribute with for
example.text: Traditionally, the medical establishment has waited two years *trace* to approve adult treatments for pediatric uses, because of a compbination of conservative safety standards and red tape.

example.name: NP only, all arguments
example.text: Internal Revenue Service approval of the move as a tax-freetransaction

example.name: Arg 0 only
example.text: It took almost three years to get the approval of the FDA.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: They gained her parent's approval of Charlio as a husband for her.
